name: Project Prophecy
description:
Explore the ominous tower and take revenge as a Cupcake hero! The LEADER is waiting at the top of tower, you must reach him and take revenge for your cupcake parents!

Armed with just your cupcake legs and cute frosting top, your goal is to make your way through the tower levels. Or will you use your mighty sword to slash all obstacles in your way?

The Controls

Left and right arrow keys to move

Up arrow to jump

E/Mouse click to interact

Storyboarding, Programming, and Art by Riifushi. This game was created in 1.5 months, finally completed after a year! Despite the bugs, I am proud to  be able to say that I completed my first game. Please enjoy!

BG Music/SFX:

[REVIVE] Soundtrack - Jonochrome

Sephiroth - r'lyeh

Riifushi (myself using SFXR)
